Text: HiHi Keith Just thought I would see if you are still with Enron and lo and behold there is your name I hope that all is going well for you I havent looked closely but I assume that you are still in Houston Do you like it All is well with me Im living in Oxford England and am now working part time with a little company called Enron Direct The part time comes because I have a beautiful little year old daughter and she keeps me very busy Write back if you get a chance Crystal ps what is little Jons last name Does he still work for Enron in Houston also Crystal And I dont mean Lavorato
